overview:
Senthil Murugappan is a SEO Specialist over 8+ years of industry experience. Senthil holds a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Information Technology and master degree in Marketing.

He has optimized C2C, B2C, B2B, Multilingual sites and worked with all type of web technologies (HTML, .Net, J2EE, ASP, PHP, CGI/Perl, and Drupal) related websites and improved their traffic from search engines. He has in-depth hands on experience in Analysis tools such as Google Analytics, IBM Coremetrics, ClickTracks and Google/Yahoo/Bing Webmasters Tools for various enterprise level clients. He has experience with a broad range of SEO technologies. He also has provided subject matter expertise and best practices consultation surrounding campaign metrics and KPIs, test structure and methodologies, and development of business intelligence.

In past, Senthil has held Sr. Manager - SEO positions with Sulekha.com New Media Pvt. Ltd., His last assignment was with Sulekha.com where he led a team of 10+ search engine optimizers and web analyst. Responsible for SEO lead generation and organic traffics. In order to track the dynamic site performance through Google Analytics and refer internal dataâ€™s tracked by developers to compare and produce insights. Maintain large no. of dataâ€™s on every month and provided performance reports on time.

Apart from search marketing, his passion includes reading, music and photography.
